page.title: 11Pebworth Farming (2)
page.content: Little Meadows, Pebworth (l00 acres arable, l00 acres pasture) is primarily a dairy farm. 70 Guernsey & Freisians produce 5,500 litres per cow per annum. Milk is transported to London. 600 tons of silage is made, providing 5 months cattle feed. A contractor combines wheat and barley. Barley milled on the farm, feeds l0 beef store cattle. Father and son farm together. The need for greater mechanisation often results in destruction of hedges and gateways, but conservation, ecology and economy are important on this farm. Many existing hedges and field formations have remained undisturbed for over a century and numerous dead or diseased trees have been replaced.
